Name: ADORA 90 Premium 3rd Gen Kitchen Chimney
Short description: Presenting the one-of-its-kind smart kitchen chimney, Adora 90 Premium by Kutchina. Conceptualized for modern living, Adora 90 Premium comes with the finest premium quality features. The 90 cm long body made of mild steel weighs 32 kg. Designed in the hood layout, this 3rd generation chimney operates under 3 speeds with a suction power of 1400±50m³/Hr. Switch controls of Adora 90 Premium is made easier through touch control with wave sensors. Experience the comforts of cooking, without worrying about suffocating smoke with Adora 90 premium.

Name: Brio 75 Premium Kitchen Chimney
Short description: Presenting the brilliant kitchen chimney for Indian homes – Brio 75 Premium by Kutchina. Brio 75 premium comes with a body size of 75 cm, which is larger than most of the small size chimneys in the market. Brio 75 Premium is a hood-type chimney and is powered with 3rd generation auto clean technology. Smoke and odour from kitchen can be sucked out in 3 different speeds. Chimney is easy to operate with push button for switch control, making it comfortable for people of all generations.

Name: VETRA PREMIUM KITCHEN CHIMNEY
Short description: Presenting Vetra Premium Kitchen Chimney to keep your kitchen air light and clean. This 71 cm long chimney is perfect for compact kitchen spaces in apartments. The flat body design makes it easier to clean surfaces. Since the body is flat, it can be installed with ease. Cleaning is also made easier. Vetra Premium is similar to Leo Premium, but with enhanced features such as better autoclean power. This is a suitable choice for kitchens where food is cooked frequently! The chimney operates with push button for switch control, in two different speeds. This is the best flat shaped chimney in the starting price range. Leo Premium comes with life-time warranty for its motor.
